nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: Captain, spatial rift dead ahead. It's not on any of our charts. The 'lightning' inside is... space-time tearing itself apart. I recommend we give it a wide berth.

choices.text: Kim, what's your take? Can we study it?
Chen is right. Plot a course around it. No risks.
Take us closer. I want to see it with my own eyes.
[Previous Loop] "That's not a rift, it's a wound. A scar left over from when the 'Prometheus' fired its main weapon in two separate timelines at once."

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Study it? Captain, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! We could launch a probe to gather data, or even try to collect some of the energy it's venting. The scientific value would be immense!

choices.text: [Launch Probe] Get hard data, but risk the probe.
[Engineering] Try to harvest the vented energy.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Approaching the rift. Proximity is causing minor fluctuations in our own ship's temporal field. We are... echoing slightly.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: A scar... from a paradoxical event? That... would explain the energy readings. If we scan for specific weapon isotopes, we might be able to trace where—or when—the 'Prometheus' went.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: The probe is transmitting... it captured the life cycle of a pocket universe, from big bang to heat death, in the space of 1.7 seconds. Then it was annihilated.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: We did it! The capacitors are overflowing with exotic energy. We can use this to temporarily boost our shields to an unbelievable degree.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Feedback loop! The rift's energy is not stable! It's surged back through the collection field! Multiple system failures reported!

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You wisely chose to avoid the anomaly, leaving its mysteries for another time, or another crew.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You sacrificed a probe to gain invaluable, if terrifying, data about the nature of the rifts.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You successfully harvested a rare and powerful energy source from the anomaly.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your attempt to tamper with the anomaly backfired, causing significant damage to your ship.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your impossible knowledge has turned a random anomaly into a vital clue in your search for the Prometheus.
